trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Pompano Beach
There was one other sighting in Pompano Beach on or around January 5th 2013
Summary: 2 solid white orbs over the boats in the water
divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside for a smoke, looked over at the boats In ocean and that's when I noticed two star like orbs flying above them. I starred at it for a few sec. One startied to descend into the water. The other started going up, as it past throught the clouds the other one appeared next to it as if it come from nowhere. The two accended again and stopped again. The 2nd o object circled the first one after that the 2nd object disappeared and the 1st one hovered for a moment and then continued acending till i lost sigh. Of it in the clouds. I have video and pics on my phone, just not good quality.when I first saw it I admit I thought it was Venus or something.but once I realized what I figured it to be I got very excited my body was shaking,
